name: es6-fuzz
description: fuzzy logic with and for es6

scripts.changelog: rm ./docs/CHANGELOG.md && npx changelog https://github.com/sebs/es6-fuzz all > ./docs/CHANGELOG.md && git add . && git commit . -m '(churn): changelog'
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm run changelog && npm run docs && npm run pages
